sentences.en: A good hunting dog is alert to every sound and movement around.
sentences.cn: 一只好猎犬对四周任何响动均甚警觉.

sentences.en: A nationwide alert went out for three escaped prisoners.
sentences.cn: 全国范围內发布了警报,搜捕三名监狱逃犯.

sentences.en: Alert readers may have noticed the misprint in last week's column.
sentences.cn: 细心的读者可能已经注意到上周专栏中的印刷错误了.

sentences.en: All the Plymouth hospitals are on red alert.
sentences.cn: 普利茅斯所有的医院都处于紧急状态之中。

sentences.en: bird watchers on the alert for a rare species.
sentences.cn: 看守者人密切注意稀有鸟类

sentences.en: campaigns to alert the public to the dangers of HIV
sentences.cn: 让公众意识到艾滋病病毒危险的宣传活动

sentences.en: Drivers must be on the alert for traffic signals.
sentences.cn: 驾驶员必须密切注意交通信号.

sentences.en: Her expression was watchful and alert.
sentences.cn: 她露出一副察言观色、处处提防的表情。

sentences.en: In our reading we should always be alert for idiomatic expressions.
sentences.cn: 我们在阅读过程中应经常注意惯用法.

sentences.en: Jack was as mentally alert as a man half his age.
sentences.cn: 杰克的头脑和年龄小他一半的人一样灵活。

sentences.en: Sirens sounded an end to the red alert.
sentences.cn: 警报声宣告了红色预警的结束。

sentences.en: Soldiers and police have been put on alert.
sentences.cn: 士兵和警方都已进入警戒状态。

sentences.en: Suddenly he found himself awake and fully alert.
sentences.cn: 突然他发觉自己醒了过来，而且高度警觉。

sentences.en: Taking notes is one of the best ways to stay alert in lectures.
sentences.cn: 记笔记是听课时集中注意力的最佳方法之一。

sentences.en: The animal raised its head, suddenly alert.
sentences.cn: 那只动物突然警觉地抬起头来。

sentences.en: The armed forces were on high alert to guard against any retaliation.
sentences.cn: 武装部队保持高度戒备，以防发生任何报复行动。

sentences.en: The baby is very mentally alert.
sentences.cn: 这孩子脑子很机灵。

sentences.en: The bank is alert to the danger.
sentences.cn: 银行充分意识到了危险。

sentences.en: The rabbIt'seems to be very alert all its life.
sentences.cn: 兔子似乎一生都小心翼翼,十分警觉.

sentences.en: The school immediately alerted the police .
sentences.cn: 学校立即报了警。

sentences.en: The security alert brought the airport to a standstill .
sentences.cn: 安全警戒使机场陷入停顿状态。

phrases.tran_cn: 警戒着，防备着：注意着且防备着危险、意外或机会
紧急警报，红色警报；应急状况

trans.tran_cn: 警觉的，警惕的，意识到的
trans.tran_en: giving all your attention to what is happening, being said etc
a warning to be ready for possible danger

trans.tran_cn: 向…报警，使警觉，使戒备，使认识到
trans.tran_en: to make someone realize something important or dangerous

trans.tran_cn: 向…报警，使警觉；使认识到，使意识到
trans.tran_en: to officially warn someone about a problem or danger so that they are ready to deal with it
